name: Wanna Be Where You Are
content: Say our love is just a phase
说着我们的爱只是短暂的一段
That it's just for some days
因为我已经走了这么远
I wanna be where you are
I love everything that you say
Say our love is just a phase
说我们的爱只是短暂的一段
无论如何 谁相信那些
但是我已经走了这么远
I wanna be where you are
I wanna be I wanna be with you Wooh
我想要,我想要和你在一起
I wanna be where you are
